attributes.action: Enact legisation to prevent the use of height and width barriers which discriminate aginst motorcaravans
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are too many local authorities, campsites and shopping precincts that prevent access to car parks, leasure areas and streets with motorcaravans by means of barriers when other motorists are allowed access. Motorcaravans are private vehicles too and many are disabled vehicles. Drivers of these should not be discriminated against; especially when visiting other areas.
